name: Medicine Reminder MCP
description: MCP server for medicine refill reminders and ordering

tools.name: add_medicine
tools.description: Add a new medicine to track with refill reminders

quantity.description: The quantity of pills/units in a refill

refill_period_days.description: How many days a refill typically lasts

tools.name: set_reminder
tools.description: Set a reminder for a specific medicine

medicine_id.description: The ID of the medicine to set a reminder for

days_before_empty.description: How many days before running out to send a reminder

reminder_time.description: The time of day to send the reminder (format: 'HH:MM')

tools.name: order_refill
tools.description: Order a refill for a specific medicine

medicine_id.description: The ID of the medicine to order a refill for

tools.name: get_upcoming_reminders
tools.description: Get a list of upcoming medicine refill reminders
